head.title: Equity Offerings Scheduled for This Week

hedline.hl1: Equity Offerings Scheduled for This Week

block.p: The following equity and convertible debt offerings are expected this week:
ASM Lithography Holding N.V., the Netherlands, 60 million ordinary shares. Credit Suisse First Boston and Goldman, Sachs & Co.
The following equity and convertible debt offerings are expected this week:
ASM Lithography Holding N.V., the Netherlands, 60 million ordinary shares. Credit Suisse First Boston and Goldman, Sachs & Co.
August Technology Corp., Bloomington, Minn., an initial public offering of three million shares. Needham.
CapRock Communications Corp., Dallas, four million shares. Salomon Smith Barney and Bear, Stearns & Co.
Celeritek Inc., Santa Clara, Calif., two million shares. CIBC Wood Grundy.
Cepheid, Sunnyvale, Calif., an initial public offering of five million shares. UBS Warburg.
Dendreon Corp., Seattle, an initial public offering of 4.5 million shares. Prudential Securities.
Deutsche Telekom, Germany, 200 million American depository shares, each A.D.S. represents one ordinary share. Deutsche Bank Alex. Brown, Dresdner and Goldman, Sachs & Co.
EChapman.com Inc., Baltimore, an initial public offering of 1.7 million shares. Chapman.
Intuitive Surgical Inc., Mountain View, Calif., an initial public offering of eight million shares. Lehman Brothers.
Next Level Communications Inc., Rohnhert, Calif., 1.5 million shares. Credit Suisse First Boston.
OSCA Inc., Lafayette, La., an initial public offering of 5.6 million Class A shares. Salomon Smith Barney.
Rediff.com India Ltd., Mubai, India, an initial public offering of 4.6 million American depository shares, each A.D.S. represents half of one equity share. Goldman, Sachs & Co.
Urban Cool Network Inc., Dallas, an initial public offering of two million shares. Kashner Davidson Securities Corp.
Vitech America Inc., Miami, 4.2 million shares. Joe Charles.
